title: Mission Healthy India
cleaned_text: About Us Thanks for your love & belief in us. It's our huge gratification to celebrate The Dawn of the 14th successive Year... It's all concerning taking a step back & refreshing the recollections of the inspiration of Dhanwantari Distributors Pvt. Ltd. it had been created in 2008. For over 14 years, Dhanwantari Distributors Pvt. Ltd.® has been providing high-quality, economic Ayurvedic medicines & FMCG merchandise trusted by aid professionals and patients across geographies. Business leader MD. Prakash Khalate & MD. Shashikant Gulumkar joined their hands at the side of leading Healthcare Expert Dr. Ramesh Patil (M.D. Medicine) to create a promoting company. Based on the 5 principles of Vision, Integrity, opportunity, Freedom, and Success, the corporate has set its mission to create Healthy India by providing the most effective Herbo-Nutritional merchandise for grouping besides Organic Agricultural merchandise & Organic Animal Health merchandise. Millions of our happy customers are enjoying versatile and cost-effective solutions. The final goal of the corporate is to achieve the market with the foremost ayurvedic & seasoning merchandise. The corporate manufactures most of its whole merchandise with sister concern company RPS Biotech Pvt. Ltd. 4 CROWN AMBASSADOR 3500 RUBY 12000 PEARL 200 DIAMONDS 43 EXECUTIVE DIAMONDS 12
